kou commented on pull request #6171: ARROW-7558: [Packaging][deb][RPM] Use the host owner and group for artifacts
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6171
 
 
   If we don't this, artifacts are owned by root. Because we use root
   user in Docker.
